issue.title: Pagination missing in frontend object management
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Well, everything is said in the title !

User should be able to define how many results he/she wants to display on the page.
Default value should be set to "20"

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Misses as well under metadate management (task=listMetadata)

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Because it may cause some templating problems for some EasySDI users, I suggest to add under EasySDI general configuration two options :

- pagination default value (20)
- able pagination choice : yes/no

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Xavier,

I agree with you but propose to change such issue from defect to feature.
With V4, object management in backoffice operates default Joomla pagination.

Thanks,
